summary: This mod replaces Snakes Bluff Redoubt with an Imperial Settlement.
descriptionHtml:
Intoducing the Imperial Camp & Fort Marnis.This is a Khajiit only imperial camp run by a Khajiit General named Yajimir. This is a replacer mod for Serpents Bluff
Redoubt, a forsword camp.

--

This is a WIP that consists of 2 NPCs, some minor changes to the outside camp, a complete exterior overhaul to the fort, and a minor overhaul to the interior. It's
a larger scale WIP but I switch projects frequently. Unless this one gets corrupted like my last 2, then I'll keep updating it. I'll be removing the blood splatter
when I'm able to get around to it.

--

I'm not sure what kinds of quests are linked to Serpents Bluff Redoubt, I tried not to move any markers or anything like that so that quests would still work, but
no guarantee's.
author: Doc
